content.text: Hi there! I'm a writer. What do you do for work?
I work in a publishing building.
It's really interesting! I get to see a lot of behind-the-scenes stuff of the publishing industry.
That sounds really cool! I'm a bit of a writer myself, but I don't have any experience in the publishing industry.
Oh, that's awesome! What kind of writing do you do?
I mostly write short stories and poems. I'm also working on a novel, but it's still in the early stages.
That's great! I love reading short stories and poems. I'm not much of a novelist myself, but I really enjoy reading them.
That's cool! Do you have any favorite authors?
Sure, I love Jane Austen, Emily Brontë, and Charles Dickens.
Those are all great authors! I love Jane Austen too. She's one of my favorites.
Me too! She's such a genius writer.
Yeah, she is. I love her characters and the way she writes about relationships.
Me too! I think her characters are so well-developed and relatable.
Yeah, they are. I also love her humor.
Me too! She has a great sense of humor.
Well, it's been nice talking to you. I'm going to go back to writing now.
Oh, okay. It was nice talking to you too!
